1678330.name: Heim Demo
1678330.description:
Play the first 3 locations of Heim in this extensive demo! Take your first steps into the world of Heim - try your hand at its unique puzzles, explore the islands of Aldrheim and delve into the lore!
This demo includes multiple hours of content, depending on how smoothly you traverse the game. Recounting your experience via the Steam forums, Heim social media or subreddit (r/Heim) would be greatly appreciated!
